attributes.action: No cuts to Pip for disabled UK citizens untill we don't pay for refugees
attributes.additional_details: Disabled people in the UK might not of personally contributed to the UK economy but there families are all tax paying citizens and have through generations contributed to the UK economy. Untill the government stop paying billions of pounds for foreign citizens they shouldn't be making curs
attributes.background: Stop intended cuts for UK disabled citizens while they continue to support foreign refugees

rejection.details:
You may wish to sign the following petitions, which call for similar action: 

Stop financial and other support for asylum seekers
https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/705383

Stop PIP Cuts: Protect Support for Disabled People
https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/721918

Protect Disability Benefits: Stop Changes to PIP and Universal Credit
https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/721828
